To phrase is to express something in a particular way or using certain words, often for clarity or emphasis.
A phrase is a group of words used together in a sentence to convey a specific meaning.
noun, verb
n. 短语, 习语, 措辞, 乐句,vt. 措词, 将(乐曲)分成乐句
